scripts.setup-yarn: yarn set version 3.7.0 && yarn config set nodeLinker node-modules && yarn plugin import workspace-tools
scripts.package: yarn build-common && yarn workspaces foreach run package
scripts.gh-action-start: yarn build-common && yarn workspace '@gatling-enterprise-runner/gh-action' run start
scripts.docker-runner-start: yarn build-common && yarn workspace '@gatling-enterprise-runner/docker' run start
